pullRequest.title: SONARJAVA-3419 Rule S5854: Regex containing characters subjects to normalization should use the CANON_EQ flag

nodes.bodyText: Nice catch that enabling the flag might require using a different method and to include this in the message. 👍

commit.message: [REGEX] Flag JavaCharacter created from escaped unicode
SONARJAVA-3419 Rule S5854: Regex containing characters subjects to normalization should use the CANON_EQ flag

beforeCommit.message: Report only elements that can be canonically combined and not created from escaped unicode.

afterCommit.message: SONARJAVA-3419 Rule S5854: Regex containing characters subjects to normalization should use the CANON_EQ flag
